desc: ThermoJoe™ Mugs are the only self-heating mugs on the market with an interchangeable power source between models. With two or more power sources in charging rotation, you're able to heat your drink of choice for as long as you want to. Best temperature controlled mug and smart travel mugs in the market.

layout.text: Purchase the Travel Mug & get a FREE set of Chiller Rods!
